msg.user_not_found: User was not found, try another account
msg.user_password_not_match: User password wont match with current e-mail
msg.user_login_success: You have just been logged in, you will now be redirected to the home page

msg.request_was_send: Request for password reset was send on your e-mail. You must confirm to reset your password
msg.user_password_reset_error: Error while password reset, try again
msg.user_password_already_reset: Request for reset your password has been already sent, check your inbox
msg.user_password_reset_success: Your password has been successfully reset. Check your inbox for new temporary password
